pr_title: Add method to get properties with a prefix

timeline.message:
Add method to get properties with a prefix

Closes #1627

timeline.bodyText: I know this should probably have a @since tag, I'm just not sure what version to put. Please let me know and I'll add it.
timeline.author: jkosh44
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -55,6 +55,15 @@
      */
     String get(String key);
 
+    /**
+     * Returns all properties with a given prefix
+     *
+     * @param prefix
+     *          prefix of properties to be returned
+     * @return all properties with a given prefix
+     */

replies.bodyText: 2.1.0 would be the version we would add this kind of thing to.
replies.author: ctubbsii
